long_description: The super-narrow Shimano HG replacement pin kit for 9-speed chains is a great item to carry along on rides for easy chain repair in the field. This is the required pin to reconnect Shimano 9-Speed Chains (avoid re-using old pin per Shimano's Technical Standards). Built in guide eases installation by holding chain together while tool is being attached; guide is easily removed after installation is complete.
short_description: The super-narrow Shimano HG replacement pin kit for 9-speed chains is a great item to carry along on rides for easy chain repair in the field.
